actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the African Development Foundation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the International Security and Development Act of 1980 to authorize the African Development Foundation to waive a limitation on the amount of financing for an African development project by adding amounts of up to $100,000 to an existing project where critical to the goals of the project. Authorizes appropriations for the Foundation.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the African Development Foundation, and for other purposes.
